channel.title: New Nexus 5x and 6p!
channel.description:
Preordered the 6p in 128 gb black and a nice case, was due for a new phone (inb4 black camera bar)
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QLqHZLdt_jE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4cAHL4LMNlY&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
thoughts?

item.title: New Nexus 5x and 6p!
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“tL, post:9, topic:553447”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=672362.msg4496843#msg4496843 date=1444068010]
Would’ve got the 6P but wireless charging and the notification LED have been omitted, personally the two most useful features on my current Nexus 5.
[/quote]

There is a notification LED on the Nexus 6P.

Although having a Nexus 6, ambient display is better than notification LEDs for me, so I can’t say I’m all that bothered about getting it back on the Nexus 6P.[/quote]
Ah I see, wasn’t included on the specs list, loads of articles online written regarding it, cheers

Read full topic

item.title: New Nexus 5x and 6p!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

SilentCJ:

Would’ve got the 6P but wireless charging and the notification LED have been omitted, personally the two most useful features on my current Nexus 5.

There is a notification LED on the Nexus 6P.

Although having a Nexus 6, ambient display is better than notification LEDs for me, so I can’t say I’m all that bothered about getting it back on the Nexus 6P.

Read full topic

item.title: New Nexus 5x and 6p!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

the htc one m7 that i have right now is 32gb and im completely full, i had it for around 2 and a half yearsish and i filled it up basically the first year and a half, knowing id probably have this for 3 or maybe even 4 years and knowing how fast i rip through storage i decided to just go with the 128gb

Read full topic

item.title: New Nexus 5x and 6p!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Glad the camera is better, but they’ve removed Qi charging, which Google pushed hard, and overall the prices in the UK are ridiculous. Going to be sticking with my n4 until Google release an equally good price phone, or one with a microsd slot.

Read full topic
